attributes.name: assetId
attributes.doc: the used key frame animation asset

attributes.name: looped
attributes.doc: if true the animation is looped

attributes.name: offset
attributes.doc: current offset into the key frame animation in milliseconds

attributes.name: playing
attributes.doc: if true the key frame animation is playing; gets set to false if the end of the animation is reached and looping is disabled

attributes.name: replaySpeed
attributes.doc: the replay speed used for playing the key frame animation; i.e. a speed factor of 2 means doubled playing speed

attributes.name: reversed
attributes.doc: if true the animation is played in reverse direction
